article_title: A Health Insurance CEO Who's Bringing Apps To Affordable Care

article_metadata.description: If you’ve lost faith in the government’s effort, Aetna’s Mark Bertolini could be the guy who gives you hope that the health insurance industry will indeed improve. A top exec with the healthcare giant since 2003, and at the helm since 2010, Bertolini exemplifies this week’s Tucson Techonomy conference theme: “Leaders must think more like technologists.”
article_metadata.author: Techonomy
